var contentAPI=function contentAPI(res){var shortUrl=/https:\/\/t\.co\/+.{10}/g;var showResponse=res.map(function(tweet){if(tweet.text){tweet.text=tweet.text.replace("'\n' +","");tweet.date=new Date(tweet.date).toLocaleString('es-ES');if(tweet.entities.media){// has image tweet.text=tweet.text.replace(tweet.entities.media[0].url,"");}// urls[0] needed because API structure if(tweet.entities.urls&&tweet.entities.urls[0]){// has other urls var num_of_urls=tweet.entities.urls.length;var last_url=num_of_urls-1;if(tweet.entities.urls[last_url].expanded_url.includes("/i/web/status")){// remove status url tweet.text=tweet.text.replace(tweet.entities.urls[last_url].url,"");}tweet.entities.urls.forEach(function(url){// clickable links tweet.text=tweet.text.replace(shortUrl,"
"+url.expanded_url.slice(0,23)+"...
");});}}return'
'+'
@'+tweet.screen_name+''+'

'+tweet.text+'

'+'

'+tweet.date+'

'+'

Ver más

'+'
';}).join('');return'
'+showResponse;};export{contentAPI};
